Academic Programs

Comprehensive curriculum designed to nurture young minds from kindergarten through secondary education.

Primary (K-5)

Foundation years focusing on literacy, numeracy, and social skills development.

Core Subjects

  • English
  • Mathematics
  • Science
  • Social Studies
  • Nepali
  • + 1 more subjects

Lower Secondary (6-8)

Building on fundamentals with deeper subject exploration and critical thinking.

Core Subjects

  • English
  • Mathematics
  • Science
  • Social Studies
  • Nepali
  • + 2 more subjects

Secondary (9-10)

Comprehensive preparation for board examinations and higher education.

Core Subjects

  • English
  • Mathematics
  • Science
  • Social Studies
